title: #341: Astroturfing, Contact Tracing, the Patriot Act and Digital Entrapment with Helen Buyniski
description:
Thank you so much for tuning for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back Helen Buyniski to discuss the mad world of censorship and absolute destruction of our civil rights that seems to be coming with "Phase 2!" Thank you so much for your support.

Please check out all of Helen Buyniski's internet:
helenofdestroy.com
youtube & bitchute: helenofdestroy
twitter: @velocirapture23

Please check out all of our platforms:
